sqlMap.select: select a.cmm010id, a.buss_key, a.buss_type, a.memotext, a.createdt, a.createuserid, b.USER_NM as createusername, b.USERPHOTOSRC as userphotosrc from ismcmm010 a, LETTNEMPLYRINFO b where a.createuserid = b.EMPLYR_ID and a.buss_key = #buss_key# and a.buss_type = #buss_type# order by a.createdt desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into ismcmm010 (buss_key, buss_type, memotext, createdt, createuserid) values (#buss_key#, #buss_type#, #memotext#, now(), #createuserid#)

insert into ismcmm020 (orgfilename, savefilename) values (#orgfilename#, #savefilename#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
